knimeNode.name: Keras Multiply Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that multiplies two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that multiplies two inputs element-wise. Corresponds to the Multiply Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Add layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Add layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Multiply layer.
